name: Totally Radicool 90s Kid
description:
Made for Mini-Ludum Dare 65

Evil Castles and Saving Princesses too whack for you? Get wicked with Space Battle Fortresses and saving Space Princesses instead!

Explore the planet for power ups and get past the guard for the teleporter and take on the ultimate challenge: The Space Battle Fortress of Lord Baron Vadkonen and save the Princess Ella Bodacious!
